title: Africa: Nearly 10 000 Children Vaccinated As Malaria Vaccine Rollout in Africa Expands
description: [WHO-AFRO] Brazzaville -- Nearly 10 000 children in Burkina Faso and Cameroon have now received the RTS,S malaria vaccine since being introduced this year. A wider malaria vaccine rollout is underway this year in several African countries, with Cameroon being the first outside the malaria vaccine pilot programme to do so.

title: Africa: Proven Vector Control Interventions Needed to Stem Malaria Infections in Africa
description: [IPS] Kigali -- Experts recommend that the current prevention of malaria in highly endemic countries in Africa should integrate "locally appropriate" control measures to cope with the highest burden of mosquito-borne disease on the continent.

title: Africa: Once More Into the Breach - SADC Troops in DRC
description: [ISS] SADC's second military intervention in eastern DRC in a decade raises many questions.

title: Africa: After Wagner, Russia Makes New Military Plans in Africa
description: [DW] The Wagner Group used to serve Russia's interests in Africa -- unofficially. But with Wagner's collapse, Russian President Vladimir Putin has launched a new Africa Corps, with soldiers officially deployed to Burkina Faso.

title: Africa: Using AI to Monitor the Internet for Terror Content Is Inescapable - but Also Fraught With Pitfalls
description: [The Conversation Africa] Every minute, millions of social media posts, photos and videos flood the internet. On average, Facebook users share 694,000 stories, X (formerly Twitter) users post 360,000 posts, Snapchat users send 2.7 million snaps and YouTube users upload more than 500 hours of video.
